title: eLexicography, collaboration, bilingual corpora - all in one!

Collaboration between users and lexicographers, and bilingual corpora.
My paper is devoted to my billing or pro, which is a dictionary portal online portal and it is a single access point for different type of usage for the dictionaries and corpora.
